description:
Become a Senior Manager, Business Partner at Bloomreach! The work you do will impact our Product and Engineering departments. You will be partnering closely with senior technical leaders - our Chief Product Officer, Chief Technology Officer, VPs and Senior Directors on topics of talent strategy and execution, organization, improving ways of working and productivity. You will be a core part of the global People Business partnering team. We offer a competitive salary along with RSUs and other benefits. Working in the US or EMEA on a full-time basis, you´ll become a core part of the People Team (known elsewhere as HR team).

What challenge awaits you?

Bloomreach is on an extraordinary growth trajectory. We are building 2 highly successful products and a connected data platform, on which they operate. Your job will be to help our senior leaders in Product and Engineering to drive this transformation and help them build a world class R&D organization. Our culture is our secret ingredient and our people, our most important asset. Your role will also be to help create an environment where highly capable people thrive, want to solve tough problems and with their growth mindset help to build an industry challenger. Our people's mission is to be the single most impactful experience of our professional lives. Come and join us to make this mission possible!

Your job will be to:
• Be ambassador of our values and culture
• Be a strategic thought partner to senior leaders in Product end Engineering, for 2 strong product pillars and a platform. Teams are based in Silicon Valley, Amsterdam, Bratislava and Bangalore.
• Become a trusted partner in driving effective decision making and change management - using data to solve the right problems and implement with high-velocity; Support leaders with practical solutions to solve their problems
• Advise leaders on critical people-related topics such as organization design, multi-site and virtual-first productivity, performance management, career development, leadership empowerment, rewards and recognition, and employee engagement (including effective deployment of various People related policies)
• Build strong relationships with people from within the functions you support, in addition use quarterly barometer data to know the pulse of the organization
• Collaborate with the rest of People leadership team to create an environment at Bloomreach (via people programs, processes and policies) where highly capable people thrive and have a meaningful impact
• Lead and act as a mentor for other business partners

Your success story will be:
• In 30 days, you will understand our context, meet all the key stakeholders and get to know the company
• In 60 days, you will craft People priorities for Product and Engineering with collaboration with your key stakeholders and start executing on the plan
• In 90 days, you will have materially helped your stakeholders to advance their People related priorities

You have the following experience and qualities:

Professional experience
• Relevant business experience working with senior leadership (CxO to CxO-2) at a strategic level, in R&D for at least 3 years in a SaaS company distributed across continent
• Experience working US, India and at least one European site - understanding typical people-practices of tech companies in each of the geographies
• Ability to travel on quarterly basis to, US (Silicon Valley) India (Bangalore) and Europe - depending on location of the candidate
• University degree

Personal qualities
• Proactive in identifying and solving people related issues
• Business acumen in order to have opinions on everything we do, and push our organization to get better from a people standpoint
• Empathetic listener and effective communicator
• Data driven problem solver with good project management skills and ability to prioritize in order to create maximum impact
• Approachable with strong customer-orientation
• Proven ability to influence without direct authority
• Comfortable with ambiguity, challenging the status quo and taking part in complex strategy discussions in a dynamic work environment.

Excited? Join us and transform the future of commerce experiences.
